channel.title: NYS:HPE on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in NYS:HPE on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: HPE Sells $2.9 Billion of High-Grade Bonds to Refinance Debt
item.description: Hewlett Packard Enterprise Co. sold $2.9 billion of investment-grade bonds, in part to help refinance debt from Juniper Networks, a company it recently acquired.

item.title: HPE Sells $2.9 Billion of High-Grade Bonds to Refinance Debt
